author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 55-year-old man, A. Iruthaya Dhasan alias Dhasan, from Chinna Muttom was arrested on a charge of sexually abusing an eight-year-old girl from Manakkudi on the seashore of Keezha Manakkudi on Sunday afternoon.

The incident took place when the girl’s mother had gone for shopping, leaving her at home. When the woman returned home, the girl told her that she was taken to the seashore by Dhasan, who gave her a chocolate and sexually abused her.

On the basis of a complaint lodged by the victim’s mother, Kanyakumari All Women Police registered a case under Sections 4, 5 (m) (n) and 6 of the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012. Dhasan was arrested and remanded in judicial custody.
title: 55-year-old man held for sexually abusing girl
